items.ruleDetail: Only white shirt traffic police whose position is equal or above SI (Sub-Inspector) can collect fine for traffic violations
Brown shirt police whose position is equal or above Inspector can collect fine for traffic violations outside city limit if there is no position of traffic police
Traffic police don't have any rights to abuse or hurt public people
If police asks for unnecessary bribery or asks people to wait for a long time without proper reason, then people can call 100 and complaint. Immediate action will be taken
Traffic police doesn't have rights to take the key from the vehicle. This is allowed only if a person is caught because of racing in public roads
As per law all original related documents should be carried while driving. Nowadays in few cities scanned copy/digital copy of the documents can be shown to police if they ask for original documents
